Comment: When “both” of these individuals were going through their confirmations,myself along with many others all over the country voiced our opinions in support to our respected congressmen by email and or phone..  While I didn’t do this for bondi,simply because I didn’t know much about her,I did do this for Patel….and for a reason…  I and or we were “assured” that on their implementation into the machine that heads would roll…grandiose proclamations from both of these people of rooting out corruption from within the DOJ and government itself were made….  While I understand that things take time and roadblocks can be expected,a bit of insight from their end would go a very long way to those that gave them support..  The FBI,while I believe is corrupt,has always,to an extent did their job “somewhat”……albeit quite a bit of bias was involved….these arrests of weirdo pedos in such large numbers is admirable but to this situation…..is nothing new or groundbreaking…they’ve always arrested pedos….  While I support their efforts and do give benefit of doubt to both of them,I must remind “both” of them that these things are not what they gained support from the people for…  It looks bad when we’re told the Epstein files would be released on day one….looks even worse that what files were released were nothing more than previously released files that in some cases were redacted all the while the previously released versions were not…  All I’m saying is…..let’s see some actual investigations into the corruption as promised..
